name: Voicenotes Pages
tagline: What if publishing felt like talking to a friend?
description: Voicenotes Pages is a radically simple way to publish your ideas and stories. It’s like having a blog or podcast, but simpler. Record something, hit Publish, and done. You get a beautiful page where your audience can listen, subscribe, and ask questions.

name: Crono
tagline: Outreach personalisation at scale with data and AI
description: Rewrite with AI is Crono's feature for relevant outreach at scale. Customise entire sequences and messages, based on your lead's information in one click. Build relevance, automate multichannel sequence and close more deals with Crono ⚡️

name: Firebase Studio
tagline: A cloud-based, agentic dev environment powered by Gemini
description: Firebase Studio is an entirely web-based workspace for full-stack application development, complete with the latest generative AI from Gemini, and full-fidelity app previews, powered by cloud emulators.

name: Synthetiq
tagline: Accurate social media simulation | A/B testing & more
description: Synthetiq is an advanced social media simulation platform that allows you to see how your content performs before you ever post it online. Synthetiq allows creators to A/B test rapidly in a simulated environment to optimize their content before posting.

name: LiquidIndex 2.0
tagline: The Stripe Checkout of RAG. Fast, scalable, effortless.
description: RAG made as easy as Stripe Checkout. Create a customer, connect data, and query. Fully multi-tenant, scalable, and effortless. No infrastructure headaches, just seamless retrieval-augmented generation in minutes. Launch your AI-powered app faster.

name: Zight Customer Support Hub
tagline: Close tickets faster with automated video support
description: Speed up support with screen recordings, GIFs & screenshots in Zendesk, request videos from customers, and get AI-powered summaries & SOPs. Join the waitlist for our new Record Video feature—faster replies, happier customers!

name: Blnk Finance
tagline: Developer-first toolkit for building fintech products fast
description: Blnk Finance is an open-source developer-first toolkit for building and shipping financial products faster without compromising compliance and correctness. Get access to: 📔 Double-entry ledger | ⚙ Reconciliation engine | 🪪 Identity Management.

name: NUMI - Your AI-enabled design department
tagline: Hire AI-enabled designers in minutes, not months
description: Pair with top-tier, AI-enabled designers instantly. From product UI/UX to pitch decks, launch faster with expert design support built for startup speed.

name: Airtable AI Assistant
tagline: Build apps through conversation, not clicks
description: Your own personal app builder, data analyst, and web researchers are ready and waiting for you.

name: Grok 3 API
tagline: Grok 3: Now available on the API
description: xAI’s Grok 3 API is here! Tap into Elon Musk’s bold, multimodal AI with powerful reasoning, 131K token context, and fast tiers. Choose Grok 3 or Grok 3 Mini based on your needs. Build edgy, smart apps with Grok.

name: Kive Studios
tagline: Visual AI studio with remixable presets
description: Create beautiful visuals in seconds with easy-to-use presets. Quickly remix styles, add your products, and generate high-quality images and videos – no prompts needed.

name: Clay
tagline: An all-in-one goal app, personalized by AI
description: Clay is an AI-powered transformation app that turns ANY goal into a custom plan, with tools, AI performance views, real-world data, gamified motivation, and proof-based progress tracking, it makes staying consistent feel automatic—even fun.

name: Theya for Business
tagline: Bitcoin operating system for your business
description: We built Theya for Business so any organization using Bitcoin—whether you're 2 or 2,000 people—can securely manage bitcoin across teams, departments, and entities without relying on custodians.

name: Haystack Code Reviewer
tagline: Review code as a visual story on an infinite canvas
description: Haystack analyzes and organizes the changes in a pull request and guides you through them in a logical sequence on an interactive canvas. Haystack enables you to spend time on the stuff that matters, like providing feedback or internalizing changes.

name: Helpedby AI
tagline: Revolutionize LLMs chat platform with pay-as-you-go pricing
description: Personalize your chat experience with multiple AI models, manage & collaborate with your team, and create your own LLM agents without dev team. The best part is that you only need to pay based on your usage; no subscription is needed! 🔥

name: Adam by Tyms
tagline: AI Accountant for startup founders and small business owners
description: Adam is an AI accountant and bookkeeper that helps startup founders and small service-based business owners handle their accounting so that they can focus on growing their business. Get financial statements prepared with real-time insights powered by AI.

name: Instalog
tagline: Because your logs deserve better than firebase
description: Vibecoding? Let AI have your back. Instalog brings AI-powered logging and crash analysis to your app — so you can keep vibing while we track the bugs. No setup stress. No expensive tooling from just $0/mo.

name: IndexFlow
tagline: IndexFlow makes Discord threads searchable on the web.
description: A community-driven platform for indexing your Discord community threads and make them searchable on Google.

name: A2A Protocol
tagline: Open standard for AI Agent2Agent collaboration
description: New open standard (Google & 50+ partners) enabling communication & collaboration between diverse AI agents and frameworks. Complements MCP.

name: Resetly
tagline: All-in-one solution for relocation and expat live
description: We simplify relocation and expat life for digital pros, and more. Our platform offers curated experts, relocation programs in 10+ countries, guides, AI meeting summaries, video calls, chat & billing—all in one easy solution.
